blademaster:DancersAmulet.NAME: Dancer's Amulet
blademaster:DancersAmulet.FLAVOR: Given to you by the fabled Bladed Ancer.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b5 cards, draw #b1 card.

blademaster:CastIronTeapot.NAME: Cast-iron Teapot
blademaster:CastIronTeapot.FLAVOR: Seems to siphon blood from the dead...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies of Bleeding, heal #b4 HP.

blademaster:FancyChopsticks.NAME: Fancy Chopsticks
blademaster:FancyChopsticks.FLAVOR: Upon closer examination, they seem pretty regular.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play a Finisher each turn, draw a card.

blademaster:KomodoDragonSkull.NAME: Komodo Dragon Skull
blademaster:KomodoDragonSkull.FLAVOR: Seems to make nearby wounds fester.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply Bleeding, apply #b2 Poison as well.

blademaster:OminousHairpin.NAME: Ominous Hairpin
blademaster:OminousHairpin.FLAVOR: Looks like it was not only stabbed into hair...
DESCRIPTIONS: Bleeding enemies take #b4 damage at the end of your turn.

blademaster:PaperTeigr.NAME: Paper Teigr
blademaster:PaperTeigr.FLAVOR: A paper folded in a shape of a creature you don't recognize.
DESCRIPTIONS: Bleeding only decays by #b2 every turn. Bleeding enemies take #b30% more damage instead of #b20%.

blademaster:BlademastersAmulet.NAME: Blademaster's Amulet
blademaster:BlademastersAmulet.FLAVOR: A medallion of the old guard of the Bladedancers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b3 cards in a turn, draw #b1 card.

blademaster:SwordBladeShards.NAME: Sword Blade Shards
blademaster:SwordBladeShards.FLAVOR: Sharp enough to sever a finger with no effort.

blademaster:TeigrClaw.NAME: Teigr Claw
blademaster:TeigrClaw.FLAVOR: If the owner of this claw failed to best the Spire, what hopes do you have?
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies are considered #yBloodied at #b75% HP rather than #b60%.
